title: My account is banned for MMR BOOSTING, but I was the only one playing my account all the time!
body: Somehow my account is banned for MMR boosting, but I am hundred percent sure I did not get involved in this incident. Riot did not show me any evidence and just directly banned me for nothing. what can i do?

replies.body: You probably asked your Platinum relative/friends to play rank games for you, resulting in noticing very different playstyle in your account. That's what I think imo, not every MMR boosting only relies on mmr-boost purchases on certain websites.

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=f16OsLtV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-29T06:54:18.588+0000)
>
> You probably asked your Platinum relative/friends to play rank games for you, resulting in noticing very different playstyle in your account. That's what I think imo, not every MMR boosting only relies on mmr-boost purchases on certain websites.

If Riot can identify playstyles, why the heck can't they identify bots running rampant pre-30 in aram and TT?

> [{quoted}](name=Eagle Orion,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=f16OsLtV,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-09-29T06:57:39.565+0000)
>
> If Riot can identify playstyles, why the heck can't they identify bots running rampant pre-30 in aram and TT?

I think you mean TT & Dominion, because I rarely encounter bots when duo-ing with friends in every aram games.

Dunno, maybe Riot is still prioritizing banning people for only trash-talking.

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=f16OsLtV,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-09-29T07:00:34.689+0000)
>
> I think you mean TT & Dominion, because I rarely encounter bots when duo-ing with friends in every aram games.
> 
> Dunno, maybe Riot is still prioritizing banning people for only trash-talking.

There was, almost always, one bot braum in every aram I played over the past few days. Then again I solo'd those. Didn't notice it as often while partied. But solo, I had some arams where half the players on each team were clearly bots... or more. I think I had one game with 6 bots, and the other 3 actual human players (all on the other team) pretty much had the same impression.

I've only been playing Aram/Ai bots due to internet provider issues.

I have never met a bot. 2-4 afk' but no bots. 


Accept your ban for letting a friend log in from another access point (his home) seconds/minutes after you log out from a different access point. 
Bans are almost 99% accurate because they notice you log in from another location and your play style, map movement, champion is different. 

If I can hop onto a site and see common jungle paths which highlight over 1,000 players traveling the map submitted by replay. 

What makes you think riot dosnt have something x10 better to detect a different player playing?

There are even sites which detail performance per game and with each champion. You think riot won't notice a spike in player ability which is only being seen on Ranked and not on normals or Aram?

> [{quoted}](name=xFrostKnightx,realm=OCE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=f16OsLtV,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-29T11:11:46.714+0000)
>
> I've only been playing Aram/Ai bots due to internet provider issues.
> 
> I have never met a bot. 2-4 afk' but no bots. ?

You should try lower level matchmaking. I won't link to a couple of my other recent threads, but in summary, you don't see bots because they're being used, from what I can tell, to auto-level accounts for sell after level capping. If I told you now it was about 30% of the people I ran across on my low-level account, that would probably be an understatement. I'm not kidding.

I probably should have specified earlier, I was referring to lower-level matchmaking. No I don't see any bots at lvl 30. Then again, I wouldn't expect to see anyone use bots at lvl 30 and expect to get away with it.

Yes Riot has a ton of data. And yes I would believe they could easily detect any number of different behaviors from it, but apparently, they don't bother when it comes to bots that are 10 times stupider than Rito AI (they're pretty dumb, you have no idea.) And that's what I find absurd.
The question is I did not ask any one to play for me. I was the one played all the games and I believe the IP address was always the same since I WAS THE ONLY ONE PLAYED MY ACCOUNT

You can try submitting a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but I haven't heard of anyone having much luck with that. They can't and won't show you any evidence so as to prevent people from looking for loopholes in the system. You might be able to get them to check again, though.

on September 29th i recieved a notification that my league of legends account "Fuzzypeach13" had been suspended because "MMR boosting" as i had been told and as i have understood it is becuase they think someone had/has logged into my account and tried to boost me but truthfully it isnt true i had played last season and gotten silver as i only wanted the border and i played 10 games to get it this season i played countless games to get to gold V which happened about a week ago i had done this with the help of my friend "liamlama" i had only logged on too only too computers for the past month which was mine that i use at home and a computer that i used to play at a pc cafe with my friends (nobody logged onto the account other then me there) furthermore the fact that i am currently at 0 lp and played with my friend further proves that i wasnt "mmrboosting" is there anyway i can prove it to riot i would really like my end of the season rewards as i have played hard to earn it.

thanks

ps. im a scrub

pps: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=fuzzypeach13
I did not do anything wrong, if I did I won't talk about this here for a 10 days ban.

> [{quoted}](name=I KTL Only I,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=f16OsLtV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-09-29T18:51:57.152+0000)
>
> I did not do anything wrong, if I did I won't talk about this here for a 10 days ban.

People can't just take your word for that. People lie about this kind of thing on a regular basis(not saying you are lying).

You need to submit a support ticket. No one here can do anything about this.

Did you play as part of a premade with someone you could have been boosting or that could have been boosting you?  I'm not wholly familiar with how Riot treats boosting cases, but I'd definitely recommend submitting a support case.
